creator: Goliath BV
descriptionHtml:
▸▸▸ More than 8.000.000 games played! Thanks for your enthusiasm and feedback, keep on playing.

With more than 21 million games sold, Triominos® adds a third dimension to the classic game of dominoes. And if you know how to play dominoes you already know how to play Triominos, so you can start playing right away. Triominos®’ combination of luck and skill means that you can beat your friends fair and square (or should we say, fair and triangularly?).

▶ PLAY AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS . . .

Triominos is an online, multi-player game, that lets you compete with your friends and family anywhere, any time. Search for your friends by username or invite your Facebook friends to play. You can play as many games as you want, simultaneously! Receive push notifications when someone invited you or made a move.

▶ OR PLAY BY YOURSELF

If you want to play on your own or practice in between games with friends, try the single player mode—you can test your skills and strategy by playing against the computer.

▶ HOW TO PLAY

Slide your triangular tiles onto the “board,” matching one of the sides with the side of a tile that’s already in play. You’ll earn points for each tile you play, and bonus points for making combinations like a bridge, a hexagon, or a double hexagon. It’s easy to learn and quick to play—whether you sneak in quick moves while waiting in line for lunch or sit down and play for hours.

▶ PUZZLES

Challenge yourself with the new Puzzles. Get 1, 2 or 3 stars and complete all the levels. You can get jokers which will fit in any place, but only the best complete it without it. Don’t underestimate the complexity of the puzzles and indulge yourself in hours of fun.

© 2015 Pressman Toy Corporation
Made Under License from Pressman Toy Corporation

People also search for: domino, dominoes, muggins
descriptionShort: Triangular Domino – Multi-Player & Solitaire Puzzle Game

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- Improves support for in-app purchases on modern devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release features a number of fixes and improvements:

- Adds the online status indicator.
- Improves battery life when the app is in background.
- Restores in-game notifications.
- Fixes the Camera screen.
- Fixes the timer shown when device clock is misconfigured.
- Fixes stats screen for top players.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New single player opponents: Lucas, Prince, Lily, Skyler, Pearl, Astro, Granny, Knut and Gaia. Hint button: The game will show you the best move on the board (for coins). Single player stats: see the number of defeats and victories against each single player opponents. New tiles: Red Gloss, Cherry Wood, Oak Wood, Ivory and Metallic. Tutorial: More explanation about coins. Bug fixes and improvements.

Challenge yourself with the new Puzzles. Get 1, 2 or 3 stars and complete all the levels. You can get jokers which will fit in any place, but only the best complete it without it. Don’t underestimate the complexity of the puzzles and indulge yourself in hours of fun.

© 2015 Pressman Toy Corporation
Made Under License from Pressman Toy Corporation

People also search for: domino, dominoes, muggins
descriptionShort: Triangular Domino – Multi-Player & Solitaire Puzzle Game

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Disable the chat so you can concentrate on playing. Improved battery life. Bug fixes and improvements.

title: Triominos

creator: Goliath BV
descriptionHtml:
▸▸▸ More than 8.000.000 games played! Thanks for your enthusiasm and feedback, keep on playing.

With more than 21 million games sold, Triominos® adds a third dimension to the classic game of dominoes. And if you know how to play dominoes you already know how to play Triominos, so you can start playing right away. Triominos®’ combination of luck and skill means that you can beat your friends fair and square (or should we say, fair and triangularly?).

▶ PLAY AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS . . .

Triominos is an online, multi-player game, that lets you compete with your friends and family anywhere, any time. Search for your friends by username or invite your Facebook friends to play. You can play as many games as you want, simultaneously! Receive push notifications when someone invited you or made a move.

▶ OR PLAY BY YOURSELF

If you want to play on your own or practice in between games with friends, try the single player mode—you can test your skills and strategy by playing against the computer.

▶ HOW TO PLAY

Slide your triangular tiles onto the “board,” matching one of the sides with the side of a tile that’s already in play. You’ll earn points for each tile you play, and bonus points for making combinations like a bridge, a hexagon, or a double hexagon. It’s easy to learn and quick to play—whether you sneak in quick moves while waiting in line for lunch or sit down and play for hours.

▶ PUZZLES

Challenge yourself with the new Puzzles. Get 1, 2 or 3 stars and complete all the levels. You can get jokers which will fit in any place, but only the best complete it without it. Don’t underestimate the complexity of the puzzles and indulge yourself in hours of fun.

© 2015 Pressman Toy Corporation
Made Under License from Pressman Toy Corporation

descriptionShort: Triangular Domino – Multi-Player & Solitaire Puzzle Game

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New single player opponents: Lucas, Prince, Lily, Skyler, Pearl, Astro, Granny, Knut and Gaia. Hint button: The game will show you the best move on the board (for coins). Single player stats: see the number of defeats and victories against each single player opponents. New tiles: Red Gloss, Cherry Wood, Oak Wood, Ivory and Metallic. Tutorial: More explanation about coins. Bug fixes and improvements.

Triominos is an online, multi-player game, that lets you compete with your friends and family anywhere, any time. Search for your friends by username or invite your Facebook friends to play. You can play as many games as you want, simultaneously! Receive push notifications when someone invited you or made a move.

▶ OR PLAY BY YOURSELF

If you want to play on your own or practice in between games with friends, try the single player mode—you can test your skills and strategy by playing against the computer.

▶ HOW TO PLAY

Slide your triangular tiles onto the “board,” matching one of the sides with the side of a tile that’s already in play. You’ll earn points for each tile you play, and bonus points for making combinations like a bridge, a hexagon, or a double hexagon. It’s easy to learn and quick to play—whether you sneak in quick moves while waiting in line for lunch or sit down and play for hours.

▶ PUZZLES

Challenge yourself with the new Puzzles. Get 1, 2 or 3 stars and complete all the levels. You can get jokers which will fit in any place, but only the best complete it without it. Don’t underestimate the complexity of the puzzles and indulge yourself in hours of fun.

© 2015 Pressman Toy Corporation
Made Under License from Pressman Toy Corporation
descriptionShort: Triangular Domino – Multi-Player & Solitaire Puzzle Game

- Fix the puzzle mode.
- Reorganize your tiles.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

title: Triominos

creator: Goliath BV
descriptionHtml:
With more than 21 million games sold, Triominos ® adds a third dimension to the classic dominoes. This official online version is for free!

Triominos or Tri-ominos or Tri Ominos is a board game from the publisher of Rummikub.

▶ RULES

Slide your triangular tiles onto the board, matching one of the sides with the side of a tile already on the board. You’ll earn points for each tile you place. You can also win bonus points for making a special shape like a bridge, an hexagon or a double hexagon.

▶ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER BOARD GAME

Triominos lets you compete with friends and family. You can have as many games as you want, simultaneously!

▶ SINGLE PLAYER BOARD GAME

If you want to play on your own, you can challenge the bots in the solo mode.

▶ PUZZLES

Challenge yourself with the Puzzle mode. Get 1, 2 or 3 stars and complete all the levels.

Download Triominos now, it's for free. It's a cousin of Rummikub as it's from the vendors of Rummikub.

Includes 9 supported languages - English, German, French, Dutch, Korean, Japanese, Spanish, Polish and Portuguese.

Experienced a problem? Got a suggestion? You can reach us at triominos@goliathgames.com

© 2022 Pressman Toy Corporation, the publishers of Rummikub
